Welcome to EGH400 SQSQ Flag Detect's documentation!
===================================================
**EGH400 SLSQ Flag Detect** is a python program build for my Electrical Engineering thesis project.

It detects SLSQ flags in video footage, creates a panorama from video footage, and projects safe swim zones into the ocean.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:
